editorialSummary.text: Beer, wine & inventive cocktails fixed up in a buzzy bar with live DJs & an edgy vibe.

originalText.text:
Great lighting. Chic vibe. Awesome drinks. I had the espresso martini and it was excellent. I didn‚Äôt eat so I didn‚Äôt rate the food.
DJ Miss Parker put on a $ick $et üî•
I would Definitely recommend this venue for a good time !

originalText.text: Espresso martinis were amazing but the dance floor is CROW DED! Don‚Äôt come here if you want space to dance but DO come here for the vibes. Excellent service and fun atmosphere!

originalText.text:
Very nice and pleasant bar. Friendly staff and good music. Drinks are a bit expensive but tasty and quite strong. üòÉ
The club part downstairs has a great vibe but can get a bit crowded. Hence the name, since wiggle room is all you get when you're trying to dance. Jokes aside, this bar is definitely a must try! üòä

originalText.text:
This occurred on 11/4/23

The bar looked like a hole in the wall, from the outside. Once you get up to the front door, they give a whole speech about how they want a safe and inclusive environment for everyone and not to hesitate to find someone if you have an emergency. That night, we had a man approach our table and overstayed his welcome with us. He even pulled up a chair when we expressed not to. The man used odd tactics to try and distract the men at the table while tampering with our drinks. Once he saw we weren‚Äôt drinking our, already empty drinks, he insisted that we tried his. There was a brief moment where when he got up, he was watching us (quite literally staring) from the stairs that are next to the booth section. The situation got so sketchy so quickly and immediately we went to go get a bartender. They brought him outside where they told us not to leave until he did (we weren‚Äôt getting kicked out, it was closing time anyway). However, they kept the man outside ENTERTAINING him instead of getting him far away from the establishment. The man and the main bouncer seemed to be laughing and not stressed or pressed at all. I had to ask the other bouncer for my pepper spray even though I was still inside and ‚Äúcouldn‚Äôt have it.‚Äù I briefly explained to the other bouncer the situation so that I can have it on me and feel some sort of protection. The situation was so bizarre and uncomfortable and was handled extremely poorly. It almost felt like there were people inside and outside who were involved with the man as well. Nobody in the establishment made us feel safe despite their speech when entering at the front door. I would not suggest coming to this bar.

Nobody in the establishment made us feel safe despite their speech when entering at the front door. I would not suggest coming to this bar.

originalText.text: I am seeing a lot of review‚Äôs especially the one star reviews being based on whether they can get in or not. What many of these people fail to realize Is this establishment is not very big so people have to be let in sparingly or else it would become hazardous. Every time I come here I have a fun time. The staff always greets me with a smile, the DJs that perform are almost always killing it, and the vibes are immaculate. The drinks and cocktails are also delicious and unique. I also see people complaining about the room on the dance floor but with a name like wiggle room what do you expect? Disregarding that, on the dance floor you can expect to see disco lights, bubble and fog machines, not to mention they hand out bubble guns on the dance floor too! Now how is that not a recipe for a great night?
